about_the_game:
​ATTENTION FUTURE EMPLOYEE

​Welcome to the most advanced training program on the market: Anomalous Occurrence Management Training. In this cutting-edge simulation from the near turn of the century, you'll be tasked with solving a variety of puzzles to test your cognitive abilities, deem your performance as a future Intake officer, and fulfill the Warding institute's motto of Discovery, Progress, and Truth.

​DISCOVERY

Discover the Warding institute! You'll step into the shoes of an intake officer and face a series of increasingly challenging scenarios that our finest face on a daily basis. You'll be called upon to make difficult decisions, navigate ethical quandaries, and ultimately determine the fate of those under your care. It's a test of your intellect, skills, mindset, and your ability to stay true to Warding's values in the face of pressure and adversity.

PROGRESS

​As you progress through over 40 scenarios, you will unlock new tools and gain access to more opportunities that will help you in your quest for Warding. Score highly in the simulation to see just what our facilities have in store for you.​ Only by making progress can you uncover the secrets of the anomaly and bring about a brighter future for Warding.​
